fullText: James Ijames' Pulitzer Prize-winning play is a Black, queer, Southern riff on Hamlet that finds its own distinctive voice in this vibrant Broadway production.
dtliExcerpt: James Ijames' Pulitzer Prize-winning play is a Black, queer, Southern riff on Hamlet that finds its own distinctive voice in this vibrant Broadway production.
